example.eg: It makes sense to book train tickets in advance because they are cheaper.
After her stroke nothing the patient said made sense.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 能够被理解, 能让人听得明白

example.eg: The Egyptologist tried to make sense of the hieroglyphics.
It does not make sense to butter your bread with axle grease.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 讲不通, 不合情理, 不合逻辑

example.eg: Ainsley was drunk and what he was saying was not making sense.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 难以理解, 难以听懂
